definition: to receive (a visitor)/to admit (allow sb to enter)
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: These parts of Ord Mantell are not intended for tourists.
sentences.chinese: 曼特尔兵站的这些部分无意接待游客。

sentences.english: I should like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your gracious receptionhospitality.
sentences.chinese: 我愿向你们盛情的接待与款待表示衷心的感谢。

sentences.english: The restaurant receives hundreds of customers every day.
sentences.chinese: 这家饭店每天接待数以百计的顾客。

sentences.english: He was given a dry reception.
Destination China is one of the finest Destination Management Companies in China.
sentences.chinese: 北京紫都国旅是中国首屈一指的接待公司。

sentences.english: Everywhere we went, the French were grand to us.
sentences.chinese: 我们到处受到法国人的热情接待。

sentences.english: Supervises and directs Reception and Reservations personnel.
sentences.chinese: 对接待部和预订部工作人员进行监督和指导。

sentences.english: Afa sister-in-law very warmly received iron peak a line of people.
sentences.chinese: 阿发嫂非常热情地接待了铁峰一行人。

sentences.english: That includes electricity, water and 24-hour reception.
sentences.chinese: 它包括了水电费和24小时的接待。

sentences.english: I am looking for a 4 - by 6 -foot Oriental rug for my reception room.
sentences.chinese: 我在为我的接待室寻找一块四呎宽六呎长的东方地毯。

sentences.english: The receptionist books the room for the arriving guest.
sentences.chinese: 前台接待员为来客预订房间。

sentences.english: We have good service in our park and a four star-rated hotel is being set up.
sentences.chinese: 园区接待环境良好，正在兴建1座四星级酒店。

sentences.english: The lobby was large and had been recently redecorated.
sentences.chinese: 旅馆里的接待室很大，而且新近重新装饰过。

sentences.english: I've come to reclaim my property, " she announced to the desk clerk."
sentences.chinese: 䵑“我来要求归还我的房产，”她向接待人员宣布。

sentences.english: After a 30-minute wait, a frazzled receptionist showed up.
sentences.chinese: 经过30分钟的等待，一个疲惫不堪的接待员出现了。

sentences.english: The bridal suite was prepared for the reception of the honeymooners.
sentences.chinese: 新婚套间已准备好以接待度蜜月的人。

definition: to pay a visit/to call on
to receive sb/to grant an interview
to entertain (for dinner)/to invite to dinner
